kpi.name: M1022C201

kpi_info.title: SWI DCH/DCH TO HS-DSCH/E-DCH FOR STREAMING
kpi_info.use: The number of packet call channel switches from the DCH/DCH (xx/yy) to the HS-DSCH/E-DCH for the streaming traffic class. UPDATED: When the user's DCH/DCH (xx/yy) user plane allocation is switched to the HS-DCSH/E-DCH.

kpi.kpi_alias: SWI DCH/DCH TO HS-DSCH/E-DCH FOR STREAMING
